title: Greg Oden
summary: Gregory Wayne Oden Jr. (born January 22, 1988) is an American former professional basketball player who is a graduate assistant at Ohio State. Oden, a 7 ft 0 in (2.13 m), 250 lb (110 kg) center,[1] played college basketball at the Ohio State University for one season, during which the team was the Big Ten Champion and the tournament runner-up in the NCAA Men's Division I Basketball Championship.
